Celtics 83, Hawks 80

Celtics win Game 6, advance past Hawks in NBA playoffs

The Celtics avoided a Game 7 in Atlanta with the close win in TD Garden for the right to play the surging 76ers next in the Eastern Conference semifinals. (Boston Globe)

JPMorgan acknowledges $2b trading loss

The largest bank in the US said that it lost $2 billion in a trading portfolio designed to hedge against risks the company takes with its own money. (AP)

A 2nd school touted Warren as minority

The University of Pennsylvania lauded Senate candidate and Harvard professor Elizabeth Warren as a minority faculty member, a document shows. (Boston Globe)

US Postal Service loses $3.2 billion in second quarter

The ailing US Postal Service is reporting quarterly losses of $3.2 billion, brought on by declining mail volume and mounting costs for future retiree health benefits.
